title: Incorrect documentation for `unsafe.New()' in r.60.3
body:
by **sigma.ml**: 
The documentation for `unsafe.New()' recommends using `reflect.MakeZero()' instead of
calling itself directly.  However, in r60.3, the package `reflect' does not seem to have
the function `MakeZero()'.  Its functionality seems to have been distributed between
`reflect.New()' and `reflect.Zero()'.  The documentation of `unsafe.New()' needs to be
updated appropriately.
